mapper.update: update user_chat set initiator_id = #{initiatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, chat_content = #{chatContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where chat_id = #{chatId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select chat_id, initiator_id, user_id, created_at, updated_at, chat_content from user_chat
